name: Stonework Install and Repair
description: Our Specialty! All types of stone, pavers, patios, walkway, sitting walls, retainers (finished stone or boulders), fire pits, fireplaces, front and rear landings and steps.

name: Planting Design and Installation
description: Whether you are in need of new construction plantings or renovation of existing ones, we can assist in plant choice, layout and installation.

name: Lawn Installation and Renovation
description: Includes new lawn installation, full renovation services for existing lawns, core aeration, dethatching, and overseeding.

name: Pool Landscape Specialists
description: All aspects of new pool landscaping including decking, coping, bed prep, plantings, mulching, decorative stone, etc.

name: Spring/Fall Cleanup
description: Removal of all leaves and debris from lawn and turf areas. Spring cleanup includes a partial dethatching of the lawn (tining).

name: Weekly Maintenance
description: Includes mowing, trimming, spring and fall cleanups.

name: Mosquito/Tick Ranger
description: Mosquito Ranger is sprayed every 2-3 weeks May thru October on the property concentrating on high traffic areas

name: Gardens
description: Vegetable garden and perennial garden preparation and installation. Blueberries, raspberries, fruit trees.

name: Taylor Turf Lawn Fertilization
description: is seven applications over five visits including balanced fertilizer, pre-emergent crabgrass control (Dimension) and broadleaf weed control. Weed control is done as needed (spot sprayed) to avoid over use of pesticides. Grub control (Merit) is applied in June and July for control of Japanese Beetle Grubs and is one of the most effective and environmentally friendly products available today. A 5% discount can be taken if you pay for your fertilization program at the start of the season

name: Leuder's Environmental
description: Deep Root Fertilization‚Äù of your trees and shrubs. This is a once per year application of a slow-release tree and shrub fertilizer that includes micro nutrients as well as root bio stimulants. Its purpose is to improve the health of root systems and as a result the health of your trees and shrubs. If you would like a free estimate please check the corresponding box on the renewal card. New customers please call for this service. Payment is due at time of reservation for this service.

name: Core Aeration
description: In simplest terms, Core Aeration is the process of making finger sized holes in your lawn and depositing the removed material on the surface to break down. This allows fertilizer, water and oxygen to get to the roots where healthy grass originates. Small plugs of soil and thatch are removed allowing more air, water and nutrients to reach the root zone, leading to better plant growth. The microorganisms in the plugs that remain on the surface will dissolve back into the thatch layer to help it breakdown, naturally.
